creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text:
Font size for normal text should always be "normal" and not small or  -1 or so.
This is an usability issue. See Jacob Nielsens "Alertbox".

I propose to use "normal" text size on cms pages and at least on "default
publication" pages.
We should discuss this on lenya-dev, shouldn't we?
